summary.title: The Cave
summary.author: Bubba Gumpzzz
summary.about: Sometimes life compels you great things.  And sometimes you'd rather play this game.

ke8jfk0w.title: The Cave
ke8jfk0w.prose: It's a nice day, so you decide to go for a walk.  As you stroll along, you see a clearing with an outcrop of rocks.  Something is unusual about these rocks, some blackness unlike the surrounding soil.  You notice that this is an opening to a cave.  It is dark inside, and you wonder how far it goes.

signpost.prompt: What would you like to do?

d9wkk92l.title: You Win!
d9wkk92l.prose: You read the signs correctly, so you win.  Doesn't that feel great?
